title: About Me
text:
Hello! Iâ€™m Daryl Lai, an Applied Computing (FinTech) undergraduate with hands-on experience in machine learning, financial data analysis, and software development.
I have a strong foundation in Python, C#, and SQL, and I have gained practical industry exposure through my internship at the Accounting and Corporate Regulatory Authority (ACRA). I am currently seeking opportunities in data analytics, fintech, or applied AI, where I can apply both my technical skills and analytical thinking.


Beyond Academics
Outside of my academic and professional interests, I enjoy a wide range of activities. My hobbies include photography and exercising, which help me maintain a balance between technical work and personal well-being.
To learn more about my academic journey, internship experience, and reflections, feel free to explore the other sections of this website.

title: Student Internship at ACRA
text:
The organisation that I am undertaking my internship with is the Accounting and Corporate Regulatory Authority (ACRA). ACRA is a statutory board under the Ministry of Finance and serves as the national regulator of:

business registration

financial reporting

public accountants

corporate service providers

In addition to its regulatory responsibilities, ACRA also plays a key role as a facilitator in the development of business entities and the public accountancy profession in Singapore.


Key Functions of ACRA
ACRA is responsible for carrying out several important functions, including:

Administering legislation, such as the Accounting and Corporate Regulatory Authority Act 2004, Companies Act 1967, and Variable Capital Companies Act 2018.
Reporting to and advising the Government on matters relating to the registration and regulation of business entities, public accountants, and corporate service providers.
Establishing and managing a repository of documents and information relating to business entities and providing public access to such information.
Representing the Government internationally in matters concerning business registration and regulation.
Promoting public awareness of new business structures, compliance requirements, and corporate governance practices.




Purpose of Internship
The primary purpose of my internship is to gain practical work experience in a professional environment. As many data analysts need to determine which sector they would like to work in, this internship provides me with valuable exposure to what it is like to work as a data analyst in both the accounting industry and the public sector.



Department and Project Involvement
I am attached to the Financial Reporting and Information Department, which is responsible for administering the Financial Reporting Surveillance Programme (FRSP). Under the FRSP, selected financial statements filed with ACRA are reviewed to assess their compliance with prescribed accounting standards in Singapore.
To support the objective of improving the quality of financial reporting, the department initiated a risk profiling project aimed at identifying high-risk companies.



Internship Experience and Contributions
During my internship, I participated in this key project by analysing financial data using a combination of machine learning techniques and accounting rules to identify companies operating in high-risk areas.
In addition to project work, I was also involved in operational tasks related to the collection and processing of financial data, which helped to ease the workload of the department.



Main Tasks Completed During My Internship at ACRA

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text: In this assessment, I used Generative Artificial Intelligence (GenAI) tools to support my learning, content creation, and problem-solving process. GenAI was used as a supplementary aid rather than a replacement for my own understanding and effort.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text: In this assessment, I used Generative Artificial Intelligence (GenAI) tools to support my learning, content creation, and problem-solving process. GenAI was used as a supplementary aid rather than a replacement for my own understanding and effort.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
section: GenAI Tool Used and Reason for Selection
text:
GenAI Tool Used and Reason for Selection
The primary GenAI tool I used was ChatGPT. I chose this tool because it is easily accessible, provides clear explanations, and is effective in breaking down complex technical concepts into understandable steps. It was particularly useful for learning-related tasks and iterative refinement of ideas.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
section: How GenAI Helped in Completing the Assessment
text:
How GenAI Helped in Completing the Assessment
GenAI assisted me in several ways throughout the assessment:

Clarifying concepts: When I encountered unfamiliar or confusing topics, GenAI helped explain them in simpler terms, allowing me to grasp the underlying logic more quickly.
Structuring content: The tool helped me organise my thoughts and structure written content more clearly, especially when drafting explanations and reflections.
Debugging and improvement: GenAI was useful in identifying errors and suggesting improvements in code or formatting, which helped me resolve issues more efficiently.
Guidance rather than answers: Instead of providing direct solutions, the tool often guided me step-by-step, encouraging independent thinking.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text:
Benefits of Using GenAI
The key benefits of using GenAI include:

Improved efficiency when researching or troubleshooting
Clear and concise explanations tailored to my level of understanding
Immediate feedback and suggestions for improvement
Support for independent learning outside of classroom hours

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text:
Challenges and Limitations
Despite its usefulness, GenAI also has limitations:

The output may sometimes be too generic and requires critical evaluation
There is a risk of over-reliance if the user does not actively engage with the material
Not all generated information is guaranteed to be fully accurate, so verification is necessary

These limitations highlighted the importance of using GenAI responsibly and critically.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
section: Future Use of GenAI in Study and Work
text:
Future Use of GenAI in Study and Work
In the future, I believe GenAI tools will continue to assist me in both academic and professional settings. They can be useful for learning new technologies, drafting documentation, brainstorming ideas, and improving productivity. However, I will continue to rely on my own understanding and judgement as the primary source of decision-making.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text:
Conclusion
Overall, GenAI was a valuable learning support tool during this assessment. When used responsibly, it enhanced my understanding, efficiency, and confidence without replacing independent effort or critical thinking.
